title: Two Kings, One Crown: Pogačar Relishes Van der Poel Rematch ahead of Flanders-Roubaix Double
content:
The world champion is ready to rumble in mega rematch with Van der Poel: 'It will not be easy to beat him. I need to find a moment to open a gap.'

Read the full article at Two Kings, One Crown: Pogačar Relishes Van der Poel Rematch ahead of Flanders-Roubaix Double on Velo.
author: ahood
